articles.title: Four people including five-year-old girl are killed in horror house fire in upstate New York
articles.description: Fire crews rushed to a home in Voorheesville, in Albany, in the early hours of Saturday after a desperate 911 call from a woman trapped inside the property.
articles.content:
Four people including a five-year-old girl have been killed in a horrific house fire in upstate New York.
